import Head from 'next/head' import axios from 'axios' import LazyLoad from 'react-lazyload' import Header from '../components/header' import Footer from '../components/footer' class Resources extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { data: null } } componentDidMount() { const { ip, port } = this.state; axios.get('https://mcapi.us/server/status?ip='+ip+'&port='+port+'', { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }) .then( response => { this.setState({data: response.data}) }); } render() { return (

INTRODUCTION

What Is...
UltraCraft?

A Survival & SkyBlock Server

Started back in October 2019, Ultracraft was founded by four of Minecraft Enthusiasts who are eager enough to start their own community of players. Main goal of UltraCraft till now is to provide lag free, toxicity free community to the players of Bangladesh.
